channel.title: Deco Great Sword[META][WIREFRAME][100% by ME]
channel.description:
:D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D So I heard from some people meta is a better program than blender so I decided to have a go at it this is based of the tutorial by SilentCJ on youtube Actually if I have a say he is super heaps good! anywayz here the DECO Great Sword Gimme Feedback (and can some1 upload on youtube a tut on how to make armour thtll be pretti cool but im trying anywayz)
here it is:[img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/DragonThrowingKnifeV2-1.png[/img] Side on:[img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/DecoGr8Sword.png[/img] gimme feedback and btw the Poly count is:(how do I get poly count on meta) :P

item.title: Deco Great Sword[META][WIREFRAME][100% by ME]
item.dc:creator: @_Troll-Scape ✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆
item.description:
@_Troll-Scape wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:22, topic:375624”][quote author=✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆ link=topic=471558.msg3450444#msg3450444 date=1293712035]

Alright we get it, spelling fail.
Don’t do what I did, I can only use META, and I wanna use blender, but so many things going on.

Anyway, don’t trace. It looks poor. Also, the color choice is wretched.
[/quote]What do you mean and thanks anyway for your feedback I will consider in V2

He is saying it is better to use Blender if you can, because once you get used to the simplicity Meta holds, it becomes harder to try to learn another program. Not sure if its entirely true as I know people that changed over to Maya, but it all depends on how you are.[/quote]Will Do thanks for the admvice

Read full topic

item.title: Deco Great Sword[META][WIREFRAME][100% by ME]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆, post:21, topic:375624”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=471558.msg3449686#msg3449686 date=1293661418]
Alright we get it, spelling fail.
Don’t do what I did, I can only use META, and I wanna use blender, but so many things going on.

Anyway, don’t trace. It looks poor. Also, the color choice is wretched.
[/quote]What do you mean and thanks anyway for your feedback I will consider in V2[/quote]
He is saying it is better to use Blender if you can, because once you get used to the simplicity Meta holds, it becomes harder to try to learn another program. Not sure if its entirely true as I know people that changed over to Maya, but it all depends on how you are.

Read full topic

item.title: Deco Great Sword[META][WIREFRAME][100% by ME]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:13, topic:375624”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=471558.msg3449049#msg3449049 date=1293611076]

Meta will only restrict you and grow on you like a leech.
[/quote]ohk by restrict u mean it doesnt have features like blender?
@diff topic how do i get rep?

It just doesn’t have the features and the technology that blender has. Blender is a professional grade program, while Meta isn’t even on the radar. To me, Meta is better, but its because of Physical issues, in reality, Blender is better if you can use it.

In my opinion Meta sucks as a stand alone. You can model in it, and then import it into blender to get a better render, or for animation. Just my two cents.[/quote]
It really does in general, but fact is, some people cannot use it, my eyesight in my right eye is bad enough that I am legally blind in that eye, and yet they use the fine/small fonts.

Read full topic

In my opinion Meta sucks as a stand alone. You can model in it, and then import it into blender to get a better render, or for animation. Just my two cents.
